About Me

Freelance digital artist & graphic designer.

BIO

Hi I’m Samantha Mueller! Although I’ve been drawing since before I can remember, it’s only now that I have the courage to chase my dream of becoming a professional artist. I currently live in Florida with my fiance and 2 cats. I’m available to work on any digital art (animated or otherwise) or graphic design projects that I can fully immerse myself in!

Adobe Photoshop & Illustrator

I’ve been using Photoshop since the release of CS6 in 2012 and am experienced up to CC 2018. Just recently I have started learning Illustrator but am picking it up quickly. For quick illustrations I have been using Procreate on the iPad Pro which has allowed me to easily practice every day. It also allows me to quickly import sketches to Photoshop for finishing touches and/or animation.

Email Marketing

Over the course of the year I’ve had a crash course in the mechanics and metrics of sending eblasts via Mailchimp to over 250,000 subscribers twice a week. Working on a deadline, planning sales, and communicating with our graphic designer were among my duties.

Miscellaneous Skills

  • HTML/CSS familiarity
  • Excellent communication
  • Ability to work in a team/collaborate or individually
  • Ability to take criticism & problem solve
  • Excellent time management and organization
  • Ability to work on a deadline
